description: Un r√©sum√© d√©taill√© de la voiture

targets.rawSql:
(SELECT battery_level, date
FROM positions
WHERE car_id = $car
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1)
UNION
SELECT battery_level, date
FROM charges c
JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND p.car_id = $car
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1

(
  SELECT $__timeGroup(date, '5s'), avg(battery_level) as "Niveau de Batterie", convert_km(avg([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km), '$length_unit') as "Autonomie Th√©orique"
  FROM positions
  WHERE date BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::timestamp) AND ($__timeTo()::timestamp)
  GROUP BY 1
) UNION ALL (
  SELECT $__timeGroup(date, '5s'), avg(battery_level) as "Niveau de Batterie", convert_km(avg([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km), '$length_unit') as "$Autonomie Th√©orique"
  FROM charges
  WHERE date BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::timestamp) AND ($__timeTo()::timestamp)
  GROUP BY 1
)
ORDER BY 1

panels.description:
√Ä gauche, l'autonomie affich√©e par la voiture.


√Ä droite, le typique th√©orique avec une batterie sans d√©gradation (Typique 100 % = $autonomie_max km)

targets.rawSql:
(SELECT convert_km([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km, '$length_unit'), battery_level*$autonomie_max/100, date
FROM positions
WHERE car_id = $car AND [[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1)
UNION
SELECT convert_km([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km, '$length_unit'), battery_level*$autonomie_max/100, date
FROM charges c
JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND p.car_id = $car AND [[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Autonomie Affich√©e vs. Typique

panels.description:
Calcul de la d√©gradation affich√©e en prenant en compte l'√©cart en kilom√®tres par rapport au typique, et le niveau de batterie. 

Pour rappel le typique 100 % est $autonomie_max km.

targets.rawSql:
(SELECT (battery_level*$autonomie_max/100-convert_km([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km, '$length_unit'))/(battery_level*$autonomie_max/100), date
FROM positions
WHERE car_id = $car AND [[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km IS NOT NULL AND battery_level IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1)
UNION
SELECT (battery_level*$autonomie_max/100-convert_km([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km, '$length_unit'))/(battery_level*$autonomie_max/100), date
FROM charges c
JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND p.car_id = $car AND [[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km IS NOT NULL AND battery_level IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: D√©gradation Affich√©e

targets.rawSql:
WITH charging_process AS (
  SELECT id, end_date
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE car_id = $car
  ORDER BY start_date DESC
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT
  $__time(date),
  CASE WHEN charging_process.end_date IS NULL THEN charger_power
       ELSE 0
  END AS "Power [kW]"
FROM charges, charging_process
WHERE charging_process.id = charging_process_id
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1;

WITH charging_process AS (
  SELECT id, end_date
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE car_id = $car
  ORDER BY start_date DESC
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT
  $__time(date),
  CASE WHEN charging_process.end_date IS NULL THEN charger_voltage
       ELSE 0
  END AS "Charging Voltage [V]"
FROM charges, charging_process
WHERE charging_process.id = charging_process_id
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  $__time(date),
  charger_power as "Puissance [kW]",
  charger_actual_current as "Intensit√© [A]"
FROM
  charges c
join
  charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) and
  p.car_id = $car
ORDER BY
  date ASC

SELECT
  $__time(date),
  charger_voltage as "Tension de Charge [V]"
FROM
  charges c
join
  charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) and
  p.car_id = $car
ORDER BY
  date ASC

select LEFT(version,10) 
from updates 
where car_id = $car 
order by start_date desc limit 1
select $__time(date), convert_km(odometer::numeric, '$length_unit') from positions where car_id = $car order by date desc limit 1;

SELECT
	$__time(date),
	convert_celsius(driver_temp_setting, '$temp_unit') as "Driver Temperature [¬∞$temp_unit]"
FROM positions
WHERE car_id = $car AND [[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1;

WITH last_position AS (
	SELECT date, convert_celsius(outside_temp, '$temp_unit') AS "Outside Temperature [¬∞$temp_unit]"
	FROM positions
	WHERE car_id = $car AND outside_temp IS NOT NULL
	ORDER BY date DESC
	LIMIT 1
),
last_charge AS (
	SELECT date, convert_celsius(outside_temp, '$temp_unit') AS "Outside Temperature [¬∞$temp_unit]"
	FROM charges
	JOIN charging_processes ON charges.charging_process_id = charging_processes.id
	WHERE car_id = $car AND outside_temp IS NOT NULL
	ORDER BY date DESC
	LIMIT 1
)
SELECT * FROM last_position
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM last_charge
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  date,
  convert_celsius(inside_temp, '$temp_unit') AS "Inside Temperature [¬∞$temp_unit]"
FROM positions
WHERE
  car_id = $car
  and inside_temp is not null
order by date desc
limit 1

SELECT
  start_date AS "Start",
  end_date AS "End",
  ROUND(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM start_date))*1000 AS start_date_ts,
  ROUND(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM end_date))*1000 AS end_date_ts,
  'üöó' AS "Action",
  drives.duration_min * 60 AS "Duration",
  CASE WHEN start_geofence_id IS NULL THEN CONCAT('new?lat=', TP1.latitude, '&lng=', TP1.longitude)
       WHEN start_geofence_id IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(start_geofence_id, '/edit')
  END AS start_path,
  CASE WHEN end_geofence_id IS NULL THEN CONCAT('new?lat=', TP2.latitude, '&lng=', TP2.longitude)
       WHEN start_geofence_id IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(end_geofence_id, '/edit')
  END AS end_path,
  COALESCE(start_geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(start_address.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', start_address.road, start_address.house_number), '')), start_address.city)) AS "Start Address",
  COALESCE(end_geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(end_address.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', end_address.road, end_address.house_number), '')), end_address.city)) AS "End Address",
  convert_km(start_km::NUMERIC, '$length_unit') AS odometer_$length_unit,
  convert_km(distance::NUMERIC, '$length_unit') AS distance_$length_unit,
  convert_km((end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km - start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km)::NUMERIC, '$length_unit') * cars.efficiency AS "kWh",
  convert_km((end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km - start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km)::NUMERIC, '$length_unit') AS range_diff_$length_unit,
  TP1.battery_level AS "SoC start",
  TP2.battery_level AS "SoC",
  TP2.battery_level-TP1.battery_level AS "SoC Diff",
  convert_celsius(outside_temp_avg, '$temp_unit') AS outside_temp_avg_$temp_unit
FROM drives
  LEFT OUTER JOIN positions AS TP1 on drives.start_position_id = TP1.id
  LEFT OUTER JOIN positions AS TP2 on drives.end_position_id = TP2.id
  LEFT JOIN addresses start_address ON start_address_id = start_address.id
  LEFT JOIN addresses end_address ON  end_address_id = end_address.id
  LEFT JOIN geofences start_geofence ON start_geofence_id = start_geofence.id
  LEFT JOIN geofences end_geofence ON end_geofence_id = end_geofence.id
  JOIN cars ON cars.id = drives.car_id
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(drives.start_date)
  AND drives.car_id = 1
--  AND ("Start Address"::TEXT like '%$text_filter%' or "End Address"::TEXT like '%$text_filter%')

UNION
SELECT
  start_date AS "Start",
  end_date AS "End",
  ROUND(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM start_date))*1000 AS start_date_ts,
  ROUND(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM end_date))*1000 AS end_date_ts,
  'üîã' AS "Action",
  charging_processes.duration_min * 60 AS "Duration",
  CASE WHEN geofence_id IS NULL THEN CONCAT('new?lat=', address.latitude, '&lng=', address.longitude)
       WHEN geofence_id IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(geofence_id, '/edit')
  END AS start_path,
  NULL AS end_path,
  COALESCE(geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(address.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', address.road, address.house_number), '')), address.city)) AS "Start Address",
  '' AS "End Address",
  convert_km(position.odometer::NUMERIC, '$length_unit') AS odometer_$length_unit,
  NULL AS distance_$length_unit,
  convert_km((end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km - start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km)::NUMERIC, '$length_unit') * cars.efficiency AS "kWh",
  convert_km((end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km - start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km)::NUMERIC, '$length_unit') AS range_diff_$length_unit, 
  start_battery_level AS "SoC",
  end_battery_level AS "SoC start",
  end_battery_level - start_battery_level AS "SoC Diff",
  convert_celsius(outside_temp_avg, '$temp_unit') AS outside_temp_avg_$temp_unit
FROM charging_processes
  INNER JOIN positions AS position ON position_id = position.id
  LEFT JOIN addresses address ON address_id = address.id
  LEFT JOIN geofences geofence ON geofence_id = geofence.id
  LEFT JOIN cars on cars.id = charging_processes.car_id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(charging_processes.start_date)
  AND charging_processes.car_id = 1

UNION
SELECT
  d.end_date AS "Start",
  LEAD(d.start_date) over w AS "End",
  ROUND(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM d.end_date)) * 1000 AS start_date_ts,
  ROUND(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM LEAD(d.start_date) over w))*1000 AS end_date_ts,
  'üÖøÔ∏è' AS "Action",
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM LEAD(d.start_date) over w - d.end_date) AS "Duration",
  CASE WHEN d.end_geofence_id IS NULL THEN CONCAT('new?lat=', end_position.latitude, '&lng=', end_position.longitude)
       WHEN d.end_geofence_id IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(d.end_geofence_id, '/edit')
  END AS start_path,
  NULL AS end_path,
  COALESCE(geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(address.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', address.road, address.house_number), '')), address.city)) AS "Start Address",
  '' AS "End Address",
  convert_km(end_position.odometer::NUMERIC, '$length_unit') AS odometer_$length_unit,
  NULL AS distance_$length_unit,
  convert_km(((LEAD(d.start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km) over w + (LEAD(d.start_km) over w - d.end_km)) - d.end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km)::NUMERIC, '$length_unit') * efficiency AS "kWh",
  convert_km(((LEAD(d.start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km) over w + (LEAD(d.start_km) over w - d.end_km)) - d.end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km)::NUMERIC, '$length_unit') AS range_diff_$length_unit,
  end_position.battery_level  AS "SoC",
  LEAD(start_position.battery_level) over w AS "SoC start",
  LEAD(start_position.battery_level) over w - end_position.battery_level AS "SoC Diff",
  convert_celsius(outside_temp_avg, '$temp_unit') AS outside_temp_avg_$temp_unit
FROM
  drives AS d
  LEFT OUTER JOIN positions start_position on d.start_position_id = start_position.id
  LEFT OUTER JOIN positions end_position on d.end_position_id = end_position.id
  LEFT JOIN addresses address ON d.end_address_id = address.id
  LEFT JOIN geofences geofence ON d.end_geofence_id = geofence.id
  JOIN cars ON cars.id = d.car_id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(d.end_date)
  AND d.car_id=1

WINDOW w as (ORDER BY d.id ASC)

UNION
SELECT
  start_date AS "Start",
  start_date AS "End",
  ROUND(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM start_date))*1000 AS start_date_ts, 
  ROUND(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM start_date))*1000 AS end_date_ts, 
  'üíæ' AS "Action",
  NULL AS distance_$length_unit,
  NULL AS start_path,
  NULL AS end_path,
  version AS "Start Address",
  '' AS "End Address",
  NULL AS odometer_$length_unit,
  NULL AS "Distance", 
  NULL AS "kWh",
  NULL AS range_diff_$length_unit,
  NULL AS "SoC",
  NULL AS "SoC start",
  NULL AS "SoC Diff",
  NULL AS outside_temp_avg_$temp_unit
FROM updates
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
  AND car_id = 1

ORDER BY "Start" DESC;

WITH states AS (
  SELECT
    unnest(ARRAY [start_date, end_date]) AS date,
    unnest(ARRAY [2, 0]) AS state
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE
    car_id = 1 AND 
    ($__timeFrom() :: timestamp - interval '30 day') < start_date AND 
    (end_date < ($__timeTo() :: timestamp + interval '30 day') OR end_date IS NULL)
  UNION
  SELECT
    unnest(ARRAY [start_date, end_date]) AS date,
    unnest(ARRAY [1, 0]) AS state
  FROM drives
  WHERE
    car_id = 1 AND 
    ($__timeFrom() :: timestamp - interval '30 day') < start_date AND 
    (end_date < ($__timeTo() :: timestamp + interval '30 day') OR end_date IS NULL)
  UNION
  SELECT
    start_date AS date,
    CASE
      WHEN state = 'offline' THEN 3
      WHEN state = 'asleep' THEN 4
      WHEN state = 'online' THEN 5
    END AS state
  FROM states
  WHERE
    car_id = 1 AND 
    ($__timeFrom() :: timestamp - interval '30 day') < start_date AND 
    (end_date < ($__timeTo() :: timestamp + interval '30 day') OR end_date IS NULL)
  UNION
  SELECT
    unnest(ARRAY [start_date, end_date]) AS date,
    unnest(ARRAY [6, 0]) AS state
  FROM updates
  WHERE
    car_id = 1 AND 
    ($__timeFrom() :: timestamp - interval '30 day') < start_date AND 
    (end_date < ($__timeTo() :: timestamp + interval '30 day') OR end_date IS NULL)
)
SELECT date AS "time", state
FROM states
WHERE 
  date IS NOT NULL AND
  ($__timeFrom() :: timestamp - interval '30 day') < date AND 
  date < ($__timeTo() :: timestamp + interval '30 day') 
ORDER BY date ASC, state ASC;

list.definition: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars;
list.label: Car
list.name: car
list.query: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars;

list.definition:
with last_drives as (select start_date from charging_processes order by start_date desc limit 1)
select extract(epoch from min(start_date)) * 1000 from last_drives;
list.name: from
list.query:
with last_drives as (select start_date from charging_processes order by start_date desc limit 1)
select extract(epoch from min(start_date)) * 1000 from last_drives;

title: D√©tails
